data.text: Tuyai ʋɛtɛ, nii GALA nui Moize tooni Izilayɛle nuiti bɛ, aisa é ʋa za.
É ɠɛni ma:
Ungo, nuɓusɛiti nɛɛʋɛ è ʋɛ,
Ada-vaa ɠa é tɔgi veeni la Moize ya,
É ɠɛni ga masagi Yesulun unda,
Luɓɛn zii zuɠooza, é mina za,
Wɛlɛ nii ɠa é boni, é lo Zuda ʋa:
Levi letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Levi, nii é ɠɛɛzu kɛɛɠɛ ta dee ta-vaa ma:
Levi nuiti ta ɗa Zakɔɓe ná-nuiti kala ga ɗa-levei,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ta ɓɔ ti-zɛbɛi ʋa,
Ɓɛnzamɛn letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Zozɛfe letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
ta gulu waa ʋagɔiti, foloi ti ɓɔizu,
ta vebɛani ʋagɔiti, gize wɔlɔzaɠagiti ti feezu,
Tɔnɔgi nii fizɔgai gola, é zooi laavegai.
Unfemai ɠa Zozɛfe ʋɛ!
Zaɓulɔn letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Wa nuɓusɛiti toli wa-ɠize ɠaaɠoozagi ma,
Gade letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
É yiimazeɠeni ga ma ʋagɔi,
Dan letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Nɛfɛtali letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Asɛɛl letegi, é ɠɛni ma:
Ná-taazuʋɛ, sɔɠɔgiti ta ɠɛ ga kɔlui ta kɔlu ɓɔigi,
Ee, Yesulun, GALA pokɔɠɔma la ná!
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ga nu lɔɔɠuzuʋɛ,
Naazu Izilayɛle zeini ziilɛigi zu,
Izilayɛle nuiti, wo undaanɛɛʋɛ! Ɓɛɛni ka ti wo ɠɛʋele,
